modName: GDSDO - Guard and Soldier Diversity overhaul
summary: GDSDO - Guard & Soldier Diversity overhaul Changes The looks of the Guards & soldiers (faces), and it changes the armor they wear, what they wear. And new weapons for them to use. a rather large compilation of mods all in one that make the guards and soldiers much much harder.
descriptionHtml:
[B][center][COLOR=#c00000][SIZE=7][FONT=Times New Roman]Guard and soldier Diversity Overhaul[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/center][/B]

[SIZE=3][center][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Times New Roman][B]What are my Thoughts of vanilla guards[/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/center][/SIZE]
Well i have played this game so many times, and oh so many more times to test this mod, before i thought there was bugs with 

this mod but it was to do the old old sky-re i was using (vanilla) so i believe that this is 99% bug free.
Anyhoo my thoughts;
#1 The soldiers are weak.
#2 a petty \"trained\" soldier facing a almost untrained dragonborn (depends on level and how long you have played the game)
#3 no variation, in their faces originally there is only about 30ish facegens for all the soldiers and guards in skyrim. now there 

is well over 100.
#4 no outfit variation.
#5General Tullius had a quote that i like in game and it went like this, 
\"Battles are won by Trained and disciplined Men\". Now the Men in Skyrim aren\'t disciplined or trained.. to be honest i\'d much 

rather face a 9 year old playing call of duty (btw i kinda play call of duty, and battlefield)

[SIZE=3][center][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Times New Roman][B]One thing you get allot with this sort of mod is;[/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/center][/SIZE]
Oh my! you have mixed up the Armors, i don\'t like that im not going to download. 
A: Quite frankly i don\'t care if you don\'t want to download it.
A: They aren\'t completely mixed up, there is still parts that makes them differ from each other. one thing i didn\'t like was 

when you\'s finished the Cw quest line and over half the holds had the same armor. It got really boring. a quote from the one 

thing in skyrim, is that the Jarl\'s are largely independent, and when the Civil war is over it seems as if they are controlled by 

one Empire/faction. In oblivion All the holds/major cities are governed by a count/ess. and they are apart of the empire. but 

none of their uniforms match.
A: The thing is also, if you have another mod that you like and you want it to change the faction armors and it uses the same 

things i replaced, then you can use it, just load after this mod.

[SIZE=3][B][center][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Times New Roman]what does this do?... Well[/FONT][/COLOR][/center][/B][/SIZE]
[b]*boring stuff[/b]
-Guards and soldiers are now much stronger, because i wasn\'t satisfied with how strong they were before.
-There is also a .esp upgrade that has The soldiers even stronger, look in the downloads for the file.
-all soldiers have new perks such as, Torch Bash, Juggernaut, Barbarian, Armsman, Overdraw, Agile Defender. These all are 

higher or lower depending on the soldier or guards rank. Also the Field Mages have their own perks.
-Soldier ranks are Based on strength, kinda. [COLOR=#c00000]Stormcloak Skald And Imperial Prefect are the strongest[/COLOR], there is also two other ranks.
-Most if not all soldiers and guards are spawned with a potion of either healing or stamina.
-Most if not all soldiers and guards are equipped with a restore stamina spell.
[b]*Not so boring stuff[/b]
-New weapons have a chance to spawn on guards thanks to various mod authors *noted in the perms/credits section.
-New stormcloaks and Imperials cuirass/gauntlets and boots have chances to spawn on each and every soldier, and some of the 

items may spawn on guard depending on where they are and who they are.
-I made some of the textures mentioned above.
-New guard and soldier shields, even a light one, and i believe it is blank with no logo.
-Npc\'s now have random classes, an assassin stormcloak in the field, *say what!
-plus heaps more to much to mention.
-Finally i have added a couple chests in helgen keep with random imperial items and stormcloak items. and you will find some 

other items around the keep, E.g i have changed the mage that is in the cage, and made him wear the stormcloak mage armor 

(his original one in in his inventory also). and there is an imperial mage outfit just around the corner in a slightly harder locked 

cage.

[SIZE=3][center][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Times New Roman][B]What diversity?[/FONT][/b][/COLOR][/center][/SIZE]
[b]*boring stuff[/b]
Well i have added more diversity To the faces of the Soldiers and guards, so if you use something like Open faced guard helms: 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9514 (if used with sky-re put low in load order) you will notice the difference.
When a hold is taken over All hold cuirass armors will Not change but the gauntlets boots and helmets will.
The soldiers and guards will not only use their light armor counterparts they will also use The heavy helmet, gauntlets and 

boots. Check images for More clarification.

In this mod, There is included mods That i have found available to modders for free of use, and i had asked Pvti for his 

Imperial spear model
Here is a list of links to reference them PLEASE DOWNLOAD AND ENDORSE THEM!:

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21120]Heavy Armory By PrivateEye[/url] 
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29647]Insanity\'s Steel Bow[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12987]Improved Stormcloak and Imperial Uniforms by lumps[/url]
- New Weapons - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3871]New weapons[/url]
- New Imperial Scout Cuirass - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6947]Here[/url] (i changed texture)
- New Stormclaok textures courtesy of - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5136]Here[/url] 
(none of these mods are required to use this mod)
Thank you to all the mod authors for allowing me to use their models in this mod, please read perms tab for more.

[SIZE=3][center][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Times New Roman][B]Other good mods.[/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/center][/SIZE]
Guard dialogue overhaul: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23390
Open faced guard helms: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9514 (if used with sky-re put last in load order)
Diverse guards: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8943 NOTE: not completely compatible with this you either choose This 

ones face Gen or the Other ones face Gen last one in load order wins)
Immersive patrols: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12977
Deadly dragons: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3829
T3nd0s Skyrim Redone: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286
anything that makes enemy\'s harder.

[SIZE=3][center][COLOR=#c00000][b][FONT=Times New Roman]What i have tested;[/FONT][/b][/COLOR][/center][/SIZE]
[b]*boring stuff[/b]
I have tested this through both sides of the Civil war, and found no Serious bugs.

THIS EDITS THE VANILLA LEVELED LISTS. THIS MOD (ONCE IT IS INSTALLED) CANNOT BE UNINSTALLED AS THE LEVELED LISTS THAT ARE CHANGED WILL AFFECT THE GAME EVEN AFTER THIS MOD IS GONE, AND NOT IN A GOOD WAY EITHER. 

NOTED BUGS!
The new shields that i have added have a bug when in the inventory as they have the riften sign when it should be the shields logo.
There is a imperial soldier in Winterhold that won\'t disappear, just open up the console ( ` ) and click on him, then type disable and \'enter\'. then he should disappear, i will fix this later.




[SIZE=3][center][COLOR=#c00000][b][FONT=Times New Roman]Install/Uninstall;[/FONT][/b][/COLOR][/center][/SIZE]
[b]*boring stuff[/b]
Use Nmm to install this is the best choice.
Or extract the .zip contents into your Skyrim/data directory and make sure everything is in the correct folder.

[b]To uninstall, use Nmm or delete the .zip contents. [COLOR=#c00000]This is NOT Recommended[/COLOR]
THIS EDITS THE VANILLA LEVELED LISTS. THIS MOD (ONCE IT IS INSTALLED) CANNOT BE UNINSTALLED AS THE LEVELED LISTS 

THAT ARE CHANGED WILL AFFECT THE GAME EVEN AFTER THIS MOD IS GONE, AND NOT IN A GOOD WAY EITHER. 

Another thing is that if you have found another mod that you like and you want it to change the faction armors and it uses the 

same things i replaced, then you can use it, just load after this mod.[/b]

Facebook Page:
[url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Jiubiizeekks-Skyrim-mods/146300595538178]JiubiIzeekk\'s skyrim mods[/url]
author: JiubiIzeekk

files.name: Optional Thalmor addon
files.changelogHtml:
Optional addon Thalmor:
Thalmor immerson addon, in early stages.Absolutely requires The main file of this mod. must load after.
this has more facegen npc's 12 at the moment V1 optional addon.
i have edited some outfits.

files.name: GDSDO Version 3
files.changelogHtml:
Enchanted guard cuirass one uniqueish enhancement for each hold 1 in 4 chance of one spawning on a guard.
A small chance to spawn a silver sword in both stormcloak and imperial soldiers and guards.
Two invisible Gauntlet shields that look like your blocking with your gauntlet, light and heavy version's.
So there is in total of 3 new texture sets for 4 guard shields. will upload pictures
I have changed the classes of random npc's i have created so any battle has the potential to be different.
All new items have temper recipes and the guard/soldier shields have crafting.

& allot more stuff has been done, but this is the stuff that matters.

files.name: Basically Final main File Version 4
files.changelogHtml:
New Weapons - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3871//?
New Imperial Scout Cuirass - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6947//? (i changed texture)
New Stormclaok textures courtesy of -http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5136
And i created another stormcloak Cuirass Texture.
Changed/added two new boot textures that may be found on both stormcloak and imperials.
Gauntlet Texture That i changed is now included.
Blank shield texture is now Not showing 4 horrible Grey Triangles on each corner.
Made some Edits that i think are absolutely required.
Changed some Stuff on the Ai data tab, I made some new combat styles so now most imperial soldiers will be a defensive type soldier where they will block more than attack, and stormcloak's will attack more and block less, so they will charge in all guns blazing, because they are Nords (and imperial's and bretons as i have added these into the stormcloaks ranks) =).
29 new Unique Npc's who will patrol their respected holds, these guards are set to essential, and they will Change/dissapair if another faction takes over.

The file has been cleaned with tes5edit. But i will include an option .esp uncleaned.

files.name: Version 4 2 more edits
files.changelogHtml:
Made more edits to vanilia npc's so now this mod takes over everything. it even should over ride skyre. Even through it dose this it shoudl be loaded after skyre - main.
More weapon edits. (no new additions just some leveled list edits)
One new cuirass for the imperial legion's commanders.
New version** with some enhanced Things, like changed over the top textures that were 2048 to 1024 size. so this version contains lower res textures.
added a new set of npc's that are fairly average in strength but they have +200 extra health so they last longer in battle, Thier names are also unique so you will see them in battle.
one new stormcloak soldier because i felt like making one.
Finally fixed and cleanned the Blank sheild texture so it is now clean and very blank.
